titleStmt.title: The deceased maiden-louer. Being a pleasant new court-song: to an excellent new tune. Or to be sung to the tune of Bonny Nell

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcocke,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by STC.
Verse: "As I went forth one summers day ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting,each with woodcut at head; the second part has caption: The faithlesse louer.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
